## ZipFS.saveToVFS() method

Saves the ZIP archive to a target VFS at the given path.

**Signature:**

```typescript
saveToVFS(targetVFS: VFS, path: string): Promise<void>;
```

[VFS](doc/markdown/./base.vfs.md)


</td><td>

The file system where to save the ZIP archive


</td></tr>

</td><td>
